Name: Coordinator Takashi Kurita
Details:
Born 2970.

Became Coordinator in 3004 after his father was assassinated by one of its own Otomo bodyguards, which were led by Takashi. To dispel rumors that he had a hand of the murder, he ordered the ISF to gather all of those responsible for the lies and had them executed in his palace. Takashi spent his entire rule focused on the Davion front, while internally securing the always restless Rasalhague Military District.
